def main():
    n = int(input())
    cheeses = {}
    for i in range(n):
        cheese = input().split()
        if cheese[1] in cheeses:
            cheeses[cheese[1]] += 1
        else:
            cheeses[cheese[1]] = 1
    print(cheeses["soft"] if cheeses["soft"] < cheeses["hard"] else cheeses["hard"])

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
#!/usr/bin/env python3

def main():
    n = int(input())
    cheeses = {}
    for i in range(n):
        cheese = input().split()
        if cheese[1] not in cheeses:
            cheeses[cheese[1]] = 0
        cheeses[cheese[1]] += 1
    print(cheeses["soft"] if cheeses["soft"] < cheeses["hard"] else cheeses["hard"])

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    cheeses = {}
    for i in range(n):
        cheese = input().split()
        if cheese[1] not in cheeses:
            cheeses[cheese[1]] = 0
        cheeses[cheese[1]] += 1
    print(cheeses["soft"] if (cheeses["soft"] < cheeses["hard"]) else cheeses["hard"])

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


from collections import Counter
n = int(input())
c = Counter([input().split()[1] for _ in range(n)])
print(c['soft']*c['hard'])

import collections

def main():
    n = int(input())
    cheeses = collections.defaultdict(int)
    for i in range(n):
        cheese = input().split()
        cheeses[cheese[1]] += 1
    print(min(cheeses.values()))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

    for i in range(n):

if __name__ == "__main__":

def main():
    n = int(input())
    cheeses = {}
    for i in range(n):
        cheese = input().split()
        if cheese[2] not in cheeses:
            cheeses[cheese[2]] = 0
        cheeses[cheese[2]] += 1
    print(cheeses["soft"] if cheeses["soft"] < cheeses["hard"] else cheeses["hard"])

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    cheeses = {}
    for i in range(n):
        cheese = input().split()
        if cheese[1] not in cheeses:
            cheeses[cheese[1]] = 0
        cheeses[cheese[1]] += 1
    print(min(cheeses["soft"], cheeses["hard"]))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

n = int(input())
soft, hard = 0, 0
for _ in range(n):
    name, type = input().split()
    if type == 'soft':
        soft += 1
    elif type == 'hard':
        hard += 1
print(soft*hard)


from collections import Counter
n = int(input())
c = Counter([input().split()[1] for _ in range(n)])
print(c['soft']*c['hard'])

def main():
    n = int(input())
    cheeses = {}
    for i in range(n):
        cheese = input().split()
        if cheese[1] not in cheeses:
            cheeses[cheese[1]] = 0
        cheeses[cheese[1]] += 1
    print(cheeses["soft"] if cheeses["soft"] < cheeses["hard"] \
            else cheeses["hard"])

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
